author: sky.cactus
content: It seems like there would be significant value in an IPFS hosted UI that makes zero external requests and allows the user to specify their EL (e.g., http://localhost:8545) and it provides the user with a nice UI.

author: sky.cactus
content: Would be cool if it *also* had an option to generate the transactions and write them to a file for the user (for airgapped signing).

author: sky.cactus
content: Bonus points if the same page lets you *load* a file generated by the page, so you can just load the same page on your online device, load the file your air gapped device generated, and click submit.
